for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(str(n))
    s = 0
    for i in l:
        s = s + int(i)
    k = n + 1
    s1 = s
    while 1:
        s = 0
        l = list(str(k))
        for i in l:
            s = s + int(i)
        if s1 % 2 == 0 and s % 2 != 0 or (s1 % 2 != 0 and s % 2 == 0):
            print(k)
            break
        k = k + 1

for i in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    s = list(str(N))
    k = 0
    for i in s:
        k = k + int(i)
    k1 = k
    l = N + 1
    while 1:
        k = 0
        s = list(str(l))
        for i in s:
            k = k + int(i)
        if k % 2 == 0 and k1 % 2 != 0 or (k % 2 != 0 and k1 % 2 == 0):
            print(l)
            break
        l = l + 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    num1 = input()
    num1_int = int(num1)
    num1_l = list(num1)
    num2_int = num1_int + 1
    num2_str = str(num2_int)
    num2_l = list(num2_str)
    list1 = [int(x) for x in num1_l]
    list2 = [int(y) for y in num2_l]
    sum1 = 0
    sum2 = 0
    sum3 = 0
    num3_int = num2_int + 1
    num3_str = str(num3_int)
    num3_l = list(num3_str)
    list3 = [int(r) for r in num3_l]
    for i in list3:
        sum3 += i
    for o in list1:
        sum1 += o
    for p in list2:
        sum2 += p
    if sum1 % 2 == 0 and sum2 % 2 == 1:
        print(num2_int)
        continue
    elif sum1 % 2 == 1 and sum2 % 2 == 0:
        print(num2_int)
        continue
    elif sum1 % 2 == 0 and sum3 % 2 == 1:
        print(num3_int)
        continue
    elif sum1 % 2 == 1 and sum3 % 2 == 0:
        print(num3_int)
        continue

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    digit_sum_n = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(n)))
    x = n + 1
    while True:
        digit_sum_x = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(x)))
        if digit_sum_n % 2 != digit_sum_x % 2:
            print(x)
            break
        x += 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    N2 = sum([int(x) for x in str(N)]) % 2
    P = N
    while N2 == sum([int(x) for x in str(P)]) % 2:
        P += 1
    print(P)

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, str(n).strip()))
    s = sum(l)
    k = s % 2
    while True:
        n += 1
        l = list(map(int, str(n).strip()))
        s = sum(l)
        a = s % 2
        if k != a:
            break
    print(n)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    a = int(input())
    x = a
    y = a + 1
    s = 0
    f = 0
    while x:
        s += x % 10
        x = x // 10
    while y:
        f += y % 10
        y = y // 10
    if s % 2 == f % 2:
        print(a + 2)
    else:
        print(a + 1)

from functools import reduce
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    a = int(input())
    if a % 100 == 99:
        x = reduce(lambda x, y: int(x) + int(y), str(a))
        y = reduce(lambda x, y: int(x) + int(y), str(a + 1))
        if x % 2 == 0 and y % 2 == 0 or (x % 2 != 0 and y % 2 != 0):
            print(a + 2)
            continue
        print(a + 1)
        continue
    print(a + 1) if a % 10 != 9 else print(a + 2)
